Items.Title: Application no.  20135318 HHR by New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation pursuant to ยง7385(6) of its Enabling Act requesting approval to lease a parcel of land to Meals on Wheels of Staten Island, Inc., on a portion of the Sea View Hospital Rehabilitation Center and Home campus located at 460 Brielle Avenue, Borough of Staten Island, Community Board 2, Council District 50.
